floater.name: about viewer
floater.title: About this viewer

panel.name: authors_credits
panel.label: Authors & credits
panel.text_editor:
The Cool VL Viewer is brought to you and maintained by Henri Beauchamp.
Special credits:
The Cool VL Viewer macOS builds are courtesy of Hyang Zhao (v1.25 and former), Guru Coyote (v1.26.0 to v1.26.4), Kathrine Jansma (v1.26.4 to v1.26.10) and Catten Carter (v1.26.12 and newer). The Cool VL Viewer logo (Burning Ice) is courtesy of Amari Kanto.
Code lineage:
The Cool VL Viewer code was (from v1.24 onwards) based off the Snowglobe v1 viewer code and very large parts of the SL v2/3 viewer (Snowglobe v2 then Snowstorm v2/3) code were then backported and adapted to it by Henri Beauchamp.
Coders:
95% of the code in this viewer was written by Lindens: Philip, Tessa, Andrew, Cory, James, Ben, Char, Charlie, Colin, Dan, Daniel, Doug, Eric, Hamlet, Haney, Eve, Hunter, Ian, Jeff, Jennifer, Jim, Alexander, Zeja Pyle, ZenMondo Wormser, Zipherius Turas, Zoex Flanagan.
The SL v4+ viewer also got code backported to the Cool VL Viewer by Henri Beauchamp. Among the original authors for these pieces of code, are Linden Lab contractors: Andrey Kleshchev, Howard Stearns, Maxim Nikolenko, Michael Pohoreski.
The remaining 5% of the code is what makes this viewer so much better and unique. This viewer includes code contributed by (in alphabetical order): Able Whitman, Aimee Trescothick, Aleric Inglewood, Alissa Sabre, Ardy Lay, Armin Weatherwax, Beq Janus, bjbdragon, Boroondas Gupte, Carjay McGinnis, Catten Carter, Chalice Yao, Charles Clary, Chorazin Allen, Coaldust Numbers, Dale Glass, Drake Arconis, Elektra Hesse, Gibson Firehawk, Gigs Taggart, Guru Coyote, Hazim Gazov, Henri Beauchamp, Inusaito Sayori, Jacek Antonelli, JB Kraft, jcool410, Jonathan Yap, Kadah Coba, Kathrine Jansma, Khyota Wulluf, Kitty Barnett, Lance Corrimal, Latif Khalifa, Marine Kelley, McCabe Maxsted, Michelle2 Zenovka, Mm Alder, Moon Metty, Nicholaz Beresford, Nicky Dasmijn, NiranV Dean, Robin Cornelius, Rye Mutt (AKA Sovereign Engineer), Satomi Ahn, Siana Gearz, Shyotl Kuhr, Sione Lomu, Techwolf Lupindo, Thickbrick Sleaford, Tom Meta, Vadim Bigbear, WhiteStar Magic, Zi Ree, Zwagoth Klaar and other, unknown authors.

panel.name: licenses_copyrights
panel.label: Licences & copyrights
panel.text_editor:
Copyrights for the various components used by this viewer:
APR (c)2000-2004 The Apache Software Foundation. Boost C++ libraries (c)1998-2005 Beman Dawes & David Abrahams, (c)2006-2007 Rene Rivera. CEF3 (c)2008-2023 Marshall A. Greenblatt. Portions (c)2006-2009 Google Inc. Collada DOM (c)2005 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. cURL (c)1996-2002, Daniel Stenberg. elfio expat (c)1998-2000 Thai Open Source Software Center Ltd. fmod fontconfig FreeType (c)1996-2002, The FreeType Project (www.freetype.org). libglib GLOD (c)2003-2004 Jonathan Cohen, Nat Duca, Chris Niski (Johns Hopkins University) & David Luebke, Brenden Schubert (University of Virginia). gstreamer HACD (c)2011 Khaled Mamou. Hunspell (c)2002-2005 Németh László. jemalloc jpeg2000 (c)2001, David Taubman, The University of New South Wales. jpeglib (c)1991-1998, Thomas G. Lane. json-cpp Public domain. Author: Baptiste Lepilleur. libepoxy MIT license with material (c)2013-2014 Intel Corporation and (c)2013 The Khronos Group Inc. libndofdev (c)2008 Jan Ciger. libpng (c)2004, 2006-2011 Glenn Randers-Pehrson. libxml2 (c)1998-2012 Daniel Veillard. Lua (c)1994-2023 Lua.org, PUC-Rio. meshoptimizer (c)2016-2023 Arseny Kapoulkine. MikkTSpace (c)2011 Morten S. Mikkelsen. mimalloc Minizip (c)1998-2005 Gilles Vollant. Myspell (c)2002 Kevin B. Hendricks. nghttp2 ogg/vorbis (c)2001, Xiphophorus. openal OpenJPEG (c)2001-2003 David Janssens, (c)2002-2003 Yannick Verschueren, (c)2002-2007 Pr. Benoit Macq & UCL, (c)2003-2007 Francois-Olivier Devaux & Antonin Descampe, (c)2005 Herve Drolon (FreeImage Team). OpenSSL (c)1998-2002 The OpenSSL Project. OSSP uuid (c)2004-2008 Ralf S. Engelschall & the OSSP Project. phmap PCRE (c)1997-2008 University of Cambridge. libsdl SMAA shader (c)2013 Jorge Jimenez, Jose I. Echevarria, Belen Masia, Fernando Navarro, Diego Gutierrez. sse2neon tinygltf (c)2017 Syoyo Fujita, Aurelien Chatelain and many contributors. tracy Vulkan GLTF (c)2018 Sascha Willems. xmlrpc-epi (c)2000 Epinions Inc. xxHash (c)2012-2020 Yann Collet. zlib (c)1995-2010 Jean-loup Gailly & Mark Adler, forked as zlib-ng maintained by Hans Kristian.
Voice chat audio coding: Polycom(R) Siren14(TM) (ITU-T Rec. G.722.1 Annex C).
All rights reserved. See licenses.txt for full details and possible additional copyrights.
